text: My daughter joined Teacher Faith’s class in P6 and really benefitted from it. Teacher Faith explains the concepts really well and took the effort to make herself available for additional help after class. Not to mention that my daughter really loved the classes and found them really fun and enjoyable. She ultimately got an AL1 for Math which exceeded even her own expectations!

My boy joined Teacher Faith's P6 class this year, and his interest as well as confidence in Maths picked up significantly.  Through her help, he had done well for PSLE. Appreciate the timely feedback, advices and encouragement that Teacher Faith had generously provided throughout the year which made this possible. :)

I sent my son for the online science class for PSLE's preparation class with Teacher Jo. Her patience and dedication was shown through the way she explained the key concepts and explanations for different types of questions, and would also consistently remind them on the techniques to score marks. Overall, I found that her lessons were very helpful as my son had a big (2AL level) jump, which would not be possible without her teaching and guidance. We are thankful to have found Bluetree and Teacher Jo through our friend's recommendation.

I will like to express my heartfelt appreciation to Teacher Jo for her dedication and effort in guiding my girl throughout this year. I had the opportunity to view their recorded PPC lessons, and I'm impressed by teacher Jo clear, concise, and engaging explanations. Her unique approach to helping students remember key points through songs is truly impressive! Thanks teacher Jo once again!

Highly recommend all the PSLE kids to join classes that’s conducted by her.
My son joined teacher Faith's online P6 prep course. Her teaching methods were intuitive and allowed my son to develop useful approaches to the questions. Many thanks to teacher Faith!
